Content.Text:
<NAME_UNKOWN>Move using the <BLUE>Circle Pad</BLUE>!
Slide it slightly to walk, or slide it
further to run!
<PAGE>
Press the <BLUE>B Button</BLUE> to jump.
Press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to talk to people
or examine things.
<PAGE>
Hurry over to the person who fainted
and press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to talk!

<NAME_UNKOWN>Where are you going?
Hurry up and help the person who
fainted!
